quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), foundation stone of new complex of National Institute of Sowa Rigpa (NISR) has been laid at Saboo Thang area in Leh, Ladakh. This complex is to be developed by _________.
options: National Development Council
Ministry of Home Affairs
Ladakh Autonomous Hill Development Council
NITI Aayog
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), National Lists of Essential Medicines (NLEM) 2022 has been released by Ministry of Health and Family Welfare. How many drugs has been included in NLEM 2022?
options: 380
384
388
392
396

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), which of the following initiatives has been launched by President of India to bring together all community stakeholders to support TB patients and accelerate the country’s progress towards TB elimination?
options: Pradhan Mantri Swasthya Abhiyaan
Pradhan Mantri TB (Tuberculosis) Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan
Pradhan Mantri TB (Tuberculosis) Se Mukti Abhiyaan
Pradhan Mantri TB Limitation Programme
None of the Above

quiz.text: President of India has launched Ni-kshay Mitra initiative. Under Ni-kshay Poshan Yojana, __________ is provided to those on TB treatment as nutritional support.
options: Rs. 1000
Rs. 750
Rs. 1250
Rs. 1500
Rs. 500

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Minister for Education and Skill Development & Entrepreneurship has launched Ramakrishna Mission’s ‘Awakening’ Programme. This programme has been launhced for students of ___________.
options: Class I to III
Class I to V
Class III to V
Class V to VIII
Class IX to XII

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), First National Conference on Sustainable Coastal Management in India has been held to focus on the three inter-related themes i.e. coastal and marine biodiversity, Climate mitigation and adaptation and Coastal pollution. This conference is organized by __________.
options: India Meteorological Department
National Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecasting
National Center for Earth System Sciences
Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
National Centre for Coastal Research

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Ministry of Coal has amended Mineral Concession Rules, 1960 with a view to decriminalize its provisions. As per the amended rules, rate of penal interest for delayed payments reduced from 24% to ___________.
options: 8%
10%
12%
14%
16%

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), NITI Aayog has celebrated one-year anniversary of Shoonya, India’s zero pollution e-mobility campaign. With NITI Aayog, this initiative has been launched by ___________.
options: RMI
RMI India
NGT
1 & 2 only
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), 2nd edition of ANGAN (Augmenting Nature by Green Affordable New-habitat) 2022 – an International Conference was organised. This conference was organized by Swiss Agency for Development & Cooperation in collaboration with __________.
options: NGT
BEE
RMI India
UNDP
MoEFCC

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), E-Baal Nidan Portal has been revamped to provide time bound redressal of grievances against violation of child rights. This portal is initiated by __________.
options: NITI Aayog
Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry of Home Affairs
NCPCR
None of the Above

quiz.text: For the month of July 2022, the Quick Estimates of Index of Industrial Production (IIP) with base 2011-12 stands at 134.6. These estimate has been released by ___________.
options: NSO
OECD
Ministry of Finance
NSSO
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Group of Twenty (G20) Labour and Employment Ministers’ Meeting has been held. Which of the following countries has hosted this meeting?
options: USA
Indonesia
China
India
Russia

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), 22nd Meeting of the Council of Heads of State of the SCO/ SCO Summit has been held at Uzbekistan. India took over the rotating Presidency of Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) for which of the following years?
options: 2023
2024
2025
2026
2027

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Department of Food and Public Distribution has directed to use Millet products in official meetings and Canteens to promote the consumption of millets for its health benefit. Which of the following years has been declared as International Year of Millets by United Nations General Assembly?
options: 2023
2024
2025
2026
2027

quiz.text: As per information shared during a meeting conducted recently (Sep 2022), Agricultural and Processed Food Products Export Development Authority (APEDA) has contributed around ___________ in overall agri exports during 2021-22.
options: 50%
40%
45%
55%
60%

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Minister of Coal has inaugurated the 2-days long National Mining Ministers’ Conclave. As per the Union Minister, Government aims to increase the production of minerals by ____________ in 7 years.
options: 150%
200%
250%
300%
350%

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Minister for Finance has chaired meeting on “Illegal Loan Apps”. Which of the following steps has been taken to prevent operations of such Illegal Loan Apps?
options: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) will prepare a “Whitelist” of all the legal Apps
RBI will monitor the ‘mule/rented’ accounts that may be used for money laundering and to review/cancel dormant NBFCs (Non-Banking Financial Company) to avoid their misuse
RBI will ensure that registration of payment aggregators be completed within a timeframe
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), a Workshop on ‘Recent Initiatives for Simplifying Aadhaar Usage’ has been organised to promote Aadhaar usage by States. As per the information shared during the workshop, Aadhaar has saved __________ in DBT (Direct Benefit Transfer) Schemes.
options: Rs 1.24 Lakh crore
Rs 1.54 Lakh crore
Rs 1.94 Lakh crore
Rs 2.24 Lakh crore
Rs 2.54 Lakh crore

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), 26th Meeting of Financial Stability and Development Council (FSDC) has been chaired by Union Finance Minister. FSDC was first proposed by the Raghuram Rajan Committee in which of the following years?
options: 2003
2004
2005
2006
2008

quiz.text: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) is set to get the 'Deemed-to-be-University' status. NCERT is an apex body for school education established in ___________.
options: 1998
1972
1965
1961
1958

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), National Green Tribunal (NGT) has directed the Maharashtra government to pay Rs 12,000 crore as environmental compensation for improper management of solid and liquid waste. This penalty has been imposed by a bench headed by __________.
options: Justice Adarsh Kumar Goel
Justice S K Singh
Justice Sudhir Agarwal
Justice Swatanter Kumar
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), __________ has listed a plastic project from India under a global accreditation standard to generate India's first-ever international plastic credits.
options: Unilever
HP
EKI Energy Services
Alphabet
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) Fund for International Development has adopted its first Climate Action Plan, which commits the organization to increase its climate financing to 25% by 2025 and __________ by 2030 with a cross-cutting approach to all its projects.
options: 50%
40%
45%
55%
60%

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Engie, through its SolaireDirect Energy India unit, has collaborated with the ____________ to train 600 young people as solar module technicians.
options: NSDF
Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
NSDC
Shri Vishwakarma Skill University
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), first batch of 8 African Cheetahs from Namibia has been introduced in Kuno National Park (KNP) of Madhya Pradesh. India had declared cheetahs extinct in ___________.
options: 1998
1972
1965
1961
1952

quiz.text: The above mentioned programme was established globally in which of the following years?
options: 1992
1972
1985
1991
1988

quiz.text: The above mentioned programme has helped __________ community led projects in over 20 years.
options: 493
443
423
384
401

quiz.text: The above mentioned programme is being implemented in ___________.
options: Highlands of the North-East (Assam and Meghalaya)
Central India (Madhya Pradesh)
Coastal regions (Tamil Nadu and Maharashtra)
1 and 2 only
All of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), an agreement was signed between Government of India, Government of Assam and representatives of eight Adivasi Groups to end decades old crisis of Adivasis and tea garden workers in Assam. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to this agreement?
options: Provision to protect the social, cultural, ethnic and linguistic identity of Adivasi groups
Establishment of a Tribal Welfare and Development Council
It provides for setting up of an Adivasi Welfare & Development Council by the Govt. of India
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), which of the following companies has signed a MoU with the sports ministry, contributing Rs 100 crore towards the government’s National Sports Development Fund (NSDF) as part of its Corporate Social Responsibility?
options: Power Finance Corp
REC Ltd
POWERGRID
NMDC
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Employees' Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) has proposed to set up consultancy offices and service centres in __________ and __________ as it seeks to expand footprint outside the country.
options: Latin America, Africa
Latin America, Australia
Australia, Africa
Europe, Africa
Latin America, Europe

quiz.text: According to recent (Sep 2022) data by Reserve Bank of India, India’s forex reserves stood at USD ___________ on 2nd September, lowest since 9th October, 2020.
options: 533.105 billion
553.105 billion
573.105 billion
593.105 billion
603.105 billion

quiz.text: As per provisional estimates released by the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD), gross domestic product (GDP) of G20 economies fell ____________ quarter-on-quarter (q-o-q) in Q2 2022.
options: 0.2%
0.3%
0.5%
0.4%
0.8%

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Global rating agency Fitch has lowered India's economic growth forecast for fiscal 2022-23 (FY23) as measured by gross domestic product (GDP) to __________ from its June 2022 estimate of 7.8%.
options: 7.2%
6.3%
7%
7.4%
6.8%

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), Union Cabinet has approved a policy on long-term leasing of Railways' land as well as a proposal to develop 300 Gati Shakti cargo terminals (GSCTs) over the next five years. Which of the following statements is not correct regarding Gati Shakti Multi-Modal Cargo Terminal (GCT) policy?
options: It has been launched in December 2020
Aim is to boost investment in the development of additional terminals for handling rail cargos
Target of 100 GCT within the next 3 financial years (2022-23 to 2024-25) has been set
1st Gati Shakti Cargo Terminal has been commissioned in Thaparnagar (Jharkhand) of Asansol Division of Eastern Railway
All of the Above are correct

quiz.text: Recently (Sep 2022), __________ in collaboration with World Resources Institute (WRI), India has launched the country’s first national electric freight platform – e-FAST India (Electric Freight Accelerator for Sustainable Transport – India) to raise awareness on freight electrification bolstered by on-ground demonstration pilots and evidence-based research.
options: NITI Aayog
Flipkart
Ather Energy
NTPC
NPCI
